mapper.select: SELECT R.NO , M.NAME , M.PHONE , R.RESTIME , R.KIND , R.MEMO , R.STATUS FROM RESERVATION R JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE STATUS = 0 AND R.BRAND_NO = #{brandNo} AND NAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' ORDER BY NO DESC OFFSET (#{page} - 1) * 5 ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY
